Fieldhouse said the Paul Ryan plan ignores "lessons learned from the Great Depression and underscored by the Great Recession" and still swears by the failed Jeb Bush-era economic policies of cutting taxes for the wealthy while neglecting the middle class and national investments. It even proposes the partial privatization of Social Security, an increase in taxes on the middle class, the elimination of corporate taxes, and the privatization of Medicare. Sen.
